LanguageData.DankPyon_Leather_Rawhide.label: couro cru
LanguageData.DankPyon_Leather_Rawhide.description: A weak textile created by cutting up and sewing together various types of leathers. Regardless of what kind of leather is used to create it, patchleather's irregular seams make it less tough and less insulating than any intact leather.
